column3: Includes excise taxes on sales by certain of our foreign operations of $5,645 million, $4,797 million, and $5,595 million for the years ended December 31, 2021, 2020, and 2019.

Cost of materials and other for our Renewable Diesel segment is net of blender’s tax credit on qualified fuel mixtures of $371 million, $288 million, and $431 million for the years ended December 31, 2021, 2020, and 2019, respectively. Of the amount recognized in 2019, $156 million related to volumes blended during 2018, given that the legislation that retroactively reinstated the credit was passed and signed into law in December 2019.
